amendment.description: To prohibit funds appropriated under this Act from being used by any advisory committee that has been exempted from the Federal Advisory Committee Act.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1373 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 50. Record Vote Number: 303.

action.text: Amendment SA 1373 proposed by Senator Byrd. (consideration: CR S9864-9866, S9866-9867; text: CR S9865) To prohibit funds appropriated under this Act from being used by any advisory committee that has been exempted from the Federal Advisory Committee Act.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1373 proposed by Senator Byrd.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1373 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 50. Record Vote Number: 303.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1373 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 50. Record Vote Number: 303.
